details.arabic_diacless: ربناۤ افرغ علينا صبرا وتوفنا مسلمين
details.arabic: رَبَّنَاۤ اَفۡرِغۡ عَلَيۡنَا صَبۡرًا وَّتَوَفَّنَا مُسۡلِمِيۡنَ
details.transliteration: Rabbana afrigh 'alayna sabraw wa tawaffana Muslimeen
details.translations: Our Lord, pour upon us patience and let us die as Muslims [in submission to You].

pageTitle: Seeking patience and dying as a muslim [7:126]
